column3: ‚ÄúThis is somehow the only indica-dominant strain I can smoke during the day.  It's amazing for anxiety and stress relief, while not making you too tired.  I feel like Blue Cheese is what Blue Dream was trying to be but you just can't beat this stuff, and again *it doesn't make me sleepy*.  I had to buy a zip and put it in the freezer for the zombie apocalypse.   This is also my girlfriend's favorite strain for sex.  A...‚Äù

‚ÄúThis by far is the best strain EVER created by man...
The best Blueberry and the best UK/or Cheese mashed together for a joyful experiance.
My favorite version of this strain is the DJ Bluebbery shorts X UK Cheese. This is the absolute best med out there...i know because i smoke them all for a living...
THIS STRAIN WORKS WONDERS FOR ALL THAT TRY IT!!!!!!!‚Äù

‚ÄúNew favorite strain!!! I suffer from tourettes so I'm always stuck for daytime meds because indicas help my condition but make me sleepy. Blue cheese works wonders! A couple hits and my stress melts away as my body relaxes, my smile widens, and my tics leave me. Very relaxed feeling but not a heavy feeling like I get with indicas. Morning, day, afternoon or night this is great any time of the day!!‚Äù

‚Äúüí£üî• You know how some dogs are so ugly that they're cute, like pugs? Blue Cheese is so disgustingly stinky, just one whiff will widen your eyes and you may just laugh at how much it actually resembles a slab of Gorgonzola. This strain reeks so bad that it's good. This is the worst smelling strain you will ever love. Such a unique flavor and an even more unique high! Perfect for stress and winding down after a long d...‚Äù

‚ÄúI think I'm falling in love with all cheese strains. Blue Cheese is no exception. A marvelous strain that provides the general relaxed, euphoric, stoned buzz. Local dispensary claimed it was a sativa dominant hybrid, didn't feel like it too much. I would say that it did provide a spark of creativity, and had somewhat of a cerebral stimulation. But for the most part it is an indica dominant strain minus the heavy need...‚Äù

‚ÄúMid size, tight nugs. Dense, proper finish. Two solid bong rips and within two minutes my left ear stops working and after a few more minutes i realize im staring in to spce, open mouthed, the how to flip real estate with no money or sense infomercial reduced to a low hum in the background. Burritos, bro.  fuckin a.‚Äù

‚ÄúBlue cheese is such a great daytime smoke, Its one of them strains which slightly creep on you (5-10mins) then BAM! You feel it first cover your head in a warm blanket, you start to feel it slowly wrapping your whole body into a euphoric mellow high which is absolutely great because this Stain is easy to work with anywhere! 

I could be anywhere  high on blue cheese and could handle my self easily without monging out...‚Äù

‚ÄúOf the 3 strains I have on hand : blue cheese, blue dream, and purple passion this is my favorite daytime cannabis. Strangely (I've never experienced this before with marijuana) it really increases my level of arousal - and lately this is great because my sex drive is super low.

Also, I can go about my day 'as normal' but with a nice relaxed mind. Stress is a constant (HIGH) in my life right now so this strain is ...‚Äù

‚ÄúI smoked this strain at the beginning of my weight loss adventure and ended up losing 100 pounds.  

The Indica effects helped me focus on my goal and relax while changing my diet, exercising and sleeping better.

The taste was delicious and the smoke was thick.  I used a water pipe and had a great time with this strain.‚Äù

‚ÄúAs an indica-only smoker, I have to say BC is one of my favorites. It creeps up on you slower than most and it is a total body relaxer - great bed time medication. The name fits perfect with the smell and taste. At my dispensary we go through this faster than any other indica. A good head buzz and perfect for anxiety. Love me some Blue Cheese.‚Äù

‚ÄúIf you have a few hours to kill and want to go deep into the rabbit hole, this is your bud. Two tasty hits and I was suddenly very relaxed. After four, I found myself in front of the bathroom mirror with a clear idea of my own importance. I felt good. I stood there and talked to myself for at least 30 minutes. Justified previous decisions or tried to be honest about current motivations. Cried as childhood memories we...‚Äù
‚ÄúHot Diggity Damn, that's all I have to say‚Äù

‚ÄúStraight fire. 1 bowl is enough for 4 hours. Quick onset. Enhances the hell out of music and food. Couchlock and sedation galore. Smells and tastes like blue cheese just without that milky smell. Small patches of purple. Elite dank.‚Äù
‚ÄúVery relaxed high , sends you to sleep .. very good for night time‚Äù

‚ÄúMy first half a gram I wasn't really rating anything other than its flavour but as I had 2 g's to get through I figured I'd see it through but the more I smoked the more I enjoyed its body and head effects, it left me super relaxed, so relaxed I ended up going to bed at 10pm üòÇ it also REALLY helped with my back pain.‚Äù
‚ÄúThis strain is HELLA trippy. It makes everything look distorted. At first i didn't like the taste but the high was worth it.‚Äù

‚ÄúOh, Blue Cheese.... how do you do, those things you do.

It has a sweet, pungent taste that's unlike most full indica strains I've had, very noticeable onset with almost a childish giggly feeling,
indica creeps over the shoulders in due time leaving the user in a steady, blissful, & calm state of mind. 
Great for back pain, nausea, insomnia,
even just going about your daily routine!
4.5/5

One of my absolute favorite...‚Äù

‚ÄúGreat tasting. I love cheese strains because of the taste. Gives an amazing euphoric high and makes you very relaxed, but happy and talkative. Great for a toke before bed, or before or at a gathering of friends, family, etc. Blue Cheese is a very social weed. You will find yourself very relaxed with a smooth head and body high that kicks in pretty quickly and stays for a while, declining at a slow, pleasant rate. Wou...‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is a beautiful strain, smelling of musky berries. The smoke was smooth and thick, coating my mouth with a funky berry taste. Not sure I tasted cheese, but something that was definitely funky was going on under that well-known blueberry zing.

I rolled up a couple of half-gram joints, and smoked one over the course of two evenings. Remarkably clear headed, relaxing and creative. Definitely something I'd pick up a...‚Äù

‚Äúawesome daytime indica. not to strong a body buzz so you can get day to day chores and errands complete. im also just trying to get the 100 words thing. just sitting here watching tv. starting to get hungry now so the cheese is def a good appetite enhancer. damn the body high is kicking in stronger now. wonder if this is 100 words yet. ill just type a few more words for the hell of it so i can get it now. bip bop sho...‚Äù
‚ÄúAwesome strain. I have tourettes syndrome and depression and this strain helped more than any other I don't tried.  Great high, great taste and aroma as well.‚Äù

‚ÄúBlue Cheese is my current favorite and I'd like more, please! It makes me very happy and super spacey, with some psychedelic effects, topped off with extra chill. Makes me want to listen to music, or watch cartoons, or both. Or take a stroll around the neighborhood on a sunny day. Very dense buds of a good size. Nice smell and taste. Highly recommended!‚Äù

‚ÄúMy favorite strain. I rated and gave a review a couple months back, but I gotta come back and give it another because this shit is good! PERFECT for my anxiety and will make you feel as if your weight in your body is GONE. Not a creeper, this will make you have an instant head change and clarity for thinking in depth of things. I found myself in the shower brushing my teeth for like 5 mins thinking about good times. ...‚Äù
‚ÄúOk I just smoked some legit green cheese .. I must I finished a blunt and this scary good high crept up on me . This a strong high no doubt .. Good for humor and munchies‚Äù
‚ÄúOk I just smoked some legit green cheese .. I must I finished a blunt and this scary good high crept up on me . This a strong high no doubt .. Good for humor and munchies‚Äù

‚ÄúI just smoked this about 10mins ago and I must say it's better than expected. The high is very nice, not too couch locked, but not all over the place. Tasted like blueberry and the smoke wasnt harsh at all. I honestly started smoking more faster Because the smoke was so smooth lol.‚Äù

‚ÄúBlue Cheese is amazing. I love this strain so much, it made me so happy and I felt very relaxed and stress free, I smoked it with some friends and it made me cheese so much, how ironic. I would recommend this strain to anyone who wants a fun and relaxed time, I love Blue Cheese.‚Äù
‚ÄúI open the bag and BAM....smells soooo strong, but amazing! I like I high that will last and this certainly does!‚Äù

‚ÄúNever having a Cheese strain first I thought it was hilarious how much it really does smell like Blue Cheese...relaxing and chill high...didn't tire me out or give me an uppy high...hit the head fast....It's worth a try and does the job....but not on my list of grabbing it when it passes thru again.....legalize! Peace!‚Äù

‚ÄúI just picked up some organically grown Blue Cheese. If anyone can get their hands on organically grown Blue Cheese, I suggest you grab up as much as you can. The taste and smell are just wonderful. I smell the blueberry, but the cheese scent comes in and sort of masks the blueberry. Making it actually take on the scent of the sort of Blue Cheese that you'd buy in the dairy section of your local supermarket. Truly an...‚Äù
‚ÄúThis weed is good, it tasted good and it was a pleasant high. A true stress reliever. It isn't 4 or even 5 stars because you don't get incredibly high but good yeah.‚Äù

‚ÄúFun, interesting. Kind of psychedelic. Relaxed body and seemingly profound thoughts. Really enjoyed music. Some closed eye patterns. 
Very happy, joyous. Topped up later, less effective but still very enjoyable. 
No pain at all!‚Äù

‚ÄúAmazing for insomnia. Knocked me right out. The body high was absolutely incredible. Stinky af tho. You can definitely taste cheese too. Nugs were captivating and the trichomes were unbelievable.‚Äù

‚ÄúThey say some people stay away from Indica because of the In Da Couch feeling, this is not that strain, probably the most functional indica there is with a nearly full spectrum of recreational and medical benefits, you can't go wrong by choosing this strain because you'll be just as happy going out and having fun as staying in. One of my personal favorites.‚Äù

‚ÄúSo I have to say at first blue cheez was very nice and relaxing. Then I over indulged! I took one or to May hits off my vape pen and began to have a slight paranoia attack (completely my fault) that lasted for maybe 10 minutes wasn't terrible but not fun either I had read on my beloved Leafly on what to do if you have a bad reaction and I remembered black pepper I don't know if it's the placebo effect or not but the ...‚Äù

‚ÄúFun, interesting. Kind of psychedelic. Relaxed body and seemingly profound thoughts. Really enjoyed music. Some closed eye patterns. 
Very happy, joyous. Topped up later, less effective but still very enjoyable. 
No pain at all!‚Äù

‚ÄúI DONT WASTE TIME ON REVIEWS!
But, Blue Cheese, is.... The One!‚Äù

‚ÄúCreeped up on my pretty slowly, tried to watch a movie but wasn't understanding anything.  Then I ate some cranberry macadamia nut cereal and it was awesome.  Slightly dizzy at time, I may have over done it, pretty bad cotton mouth.  Put me into a nice deep sleep as I was coming down.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is definitely a strain that has smell, and damn is it delicious! The nuggs look amazing, nice and fluffy, lighter shade of green with noticeable orange hairs and the green coated in crystals, even that tint in some spots of blue. Perfection in a bud right here. Strong but not so strong you can't get your everyday life done. The smoke was clean, with of course a blueberry and cheese flavor. The feeling of clear h...‚Äù
‚ÄúGreat on pain, muscle spasm, insomnia.  I use this last thing before sleep to keep muscle twitching and spasm at bay.  Very relaxing.‚Äù
‚ÄúGreat on pain, muscle spasm, insomnia.  I use this last thing before sleep to keep muscle twitching and spasm at bay.  Very relaxing.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is definitely a strain that has smell, and damn is it delicious! The nuggs look amazing, nice and fluffy, lighter shade of green with noticeable orange hairs and the green coated in crystals, even that tint in some spots of blue. Perfection in a bud right here. Strong but not so strong you can't get your everyday life done. The smoke was clean, with of course a blueberry and cheese flavor. The feeling of clear h...‚Äù

‚ÄúThis weed is straight dank I smoked 4 bowls and I was stoned a day and a quarter. Very very nice taste I enjoyed some herb chicken and escargots after and the taste with the cheesy weed tasted so good this stuff is bomb.‚Äù
‚ÄúSuper good strain to hang out with friends. Smoked a lot and I could still talk fine, yet I was very tired. The dry mouth was very intense, but some iced tea fixed that right up.‚Äù

‚ÄúSo a little bit of a read but I hope it helps. 

My relationship with cannabis has been off and on for quite a few years and unfortunately in the beginning I had a lot of sour medicating experiences. Thankfully I became knowledgeable about myself and cannabis to find strains and products that have a better chance of working with me and my body. (Indicas over Sativa, Anxiety, ADHD, PTSD and other things)

Thankfully I...‚Äù

‚ÄúEnjoy this strain very relaxing, I suffer from knee and ankle pain from many years in the army, to include 6 surgeries. I feel this dulls the pain I know it's there but doesn't impact me as severe. Doesn't push my boundaries of knowing how much activity I can do, I don't push the limits of my injuries but still can be semi-active‚Äù
‚ÄúTastes great wonderful high stops all my ibs stomach pains‚Äù

‚ÄúBlue Cheese is one of my all time favorite strains. As someone who suffers from insomnia I can fully endorse the effect of this beautiful flower. Not only do you get the strong stinky and skunky terp profile but then you are hit with a smooth and sweet aftertone that calms the nerves. This strain is a head high that will help to slow down that overworking mind of yours and let you get ready for bed.‚Äù

‚ÄúBlue Cheese is one of my all time favorite strains. As someone who suffers from insomnia I can fully endorse the effect of this beautiful flower. Not only do you get the strong stinky and skunky terp profile but then you are hit with a smooth and sweet aftertone that calms the nerves. This strain is a head high that will help to slow down that overworking mind of yours and let you get ready for bed.‚Äù

‚ÄúA tranquil high. It had me
Locked on my couch. 
The after math i wasn't to much of a fan. It had me lazy and I didn't wanna do anything or deal with anyone lol. Overall a great indica.
Felt the body tingles lightly.‚Äù

‚ÄúJust might be my new favorite! Imagine all the ganja you've ever tried, imagine all their qualities in a single strain, and you have blue cheese. Close to all the best qualities. I was still able to get work done but wouldn't be very comfortable speaking in front of a handful of serious people. 
This strain gave me a great case of perma-grin. Lifted the mood and melted the muscles. Need to stock up on this one.‚Äù
‚ÄúNice Nice Nice this was a great strain very blu cheese smell with berrys and sourness loved this great for relaxing with friends watching movies or what ever.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis strain punched me in the face; and by no means am I new to smoking. Holy hell; last night I smoked bout a gram and was I out; it hit me in about 4 to 5 minutes and after that everything was delayed; every touch every feeling. I went to a party were almost everyone was asking why I was so delayed; everything was just slow; amazing experience. Will do again. If you see this around BUY IT‚Äù

‚ÄúToday one of my marijuana dreams came true:  I at last got to try Blue Cheese and compare it with Blue Chunk.  Were they the same?  The answers is, no, they are not - but they have a very similar smell, taste, and high.  I'm in love.

I was so excited to see that my neighborhood dispensary, The Oregon Grown Gift Shop, got in Blue Cheese in my favorite cartridge brand they carry, Select Strains.  Mine tested at 61.59%...‚Äù

‚ÄúGreat tasting and smelling strain :D The buds smell like classic cheese but as soon as they're lit you can smell blueberry. Taste very nice and fruity. Not harsh on the throat at all, gently hits slowly with a body stone and then the sativa effects gradually increase leading to really colourful and abstract closed eye visuals. No paranoia or anxiety. Overall can't ask for more from a smoke :)‚Äù
‚Äúnocks my socks of everytime super pungent awesome smell super great bud‚Äù

‚ÄúGreat tasting and smelling strain :D The buds smell like classic cheese but as soon as they're lit you can smell blueberry. Taste very nice and fruity. Not harsh on the throat at all, gently hits slowly with a body stone and then the sativa effects gradually increase leading to really colourful and abstract closed eye visuals. No paranoia or anxiety. Overall can't ask for more from a smoke :)‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is my culinary cannabis of choice as its flavors are able to blend into my dishes category. The smoke is a thick pungent smoke that coats the lungs (very milky smoke) and provides a high like no other I consumed a gram of blue cheese at 12:00Am and woke up 12 hours later still high this cannabis is a great strain for a heavy long night sleep.‚Äù

‚ÄúWhat a great strain! Blue cheese quickly handled my headache, nausea and stomach cramps and left me clear-headed and relaxed. I highly recommend it for those with gastric issues, body aches and stomach cramps.‚Äù
‚ÄúBlue cheese is a personal favourite of mine. A nice soothing high that lasts up to 3 hours‚Äù
‚ÄúMainly indicia.....light head buzz than works its way to the body. SLight couchlock effect‚Äù

‚ÄúJust might be my new favorite! Imagine all the ganja you've ever tried, imagine all their qualities in a single strain, and you have blue cheese. Close to all the best qualities. I was still able to get work done but wouldn't be very comfortable speaking in front of a handful of serious people. 
This strain gave me a great case of perma-grin. Lifted the mood and melted the muscles. Need to stock up on this one.‚Äù
‚ÄúIncredible. I think this is the strain that gets me high the most, now. Got high for 3-4 hours. Great high.‚Äù

‚ÄúBlue cheese is outstanding. I have no complaints, hands down. The buds were extremely dense and ridiculously pungent. The high is very euphoric and is perfect to smoke and relax. I give this strain a solid 5/5 stars. The nugs look great, they smell very similar to blue cheese, & the high is phenomenal.‚Äù
‚ÄúSmells decent, Looks incredible, crystals all over your fingers, Mellow high doesn't get you too tired, Very good viagra effects...‚Äù
‚ÄúVery very VERY nice! .5 grams got me a nice body high and a gram in and I couldn't feel anything (in the best way!) need to lock it up though as the smell is very potent!‚Äù
‚Äúgood bud‚Äù

‚ÄúAll around my personal favourite strain, it's just the perfect bud, tastes great, high is great, but you can still function on it, very happy and relaxing. It's basically a perfected cheese, effects are similar but stronger and nicer.‚Äù
‚ÄúVery easy smoke - amdDam bud will knock you out but standard will just keep you chilled‚Äù
‚ÄúOne of my absolute favorites. Nice, mellow, productive high that allows you to get stuff done, only more happily. No couch lock or hangover"‚Äù"

‚ÄúWoah baby this is an odd strain for me. I have found that some indica strains can give me some anxiety and restlessness at decent dosages. This generally fades into more typical stoned indica feeling after about half an hour. Blue cheese is kind of an enigma to me. The first time I tried it I got a very unique high that had me feeling very impaired with a little anxiety. The second time I again felt very impaired at ...‚Äù
‚ÄúA go-to strain for feeling relaxed and chilled out. I smoke this throughout the day to help with anxiety and I am still able to work and do normal stuff without feeling tired.‚Äù
‚ÄúOne of my absolute favorites. Nice, mellow, productive high that allows you to get stuff done, only more happily. No couch lock or hangover"‚Äù"

‚ÄúGreat bud. Some of my best experiences were with this shit. I love it so much. The world just seems so great. I've never been as euphoric as i have been after smoking Cheese.  Good for stress or pain. I have scoliosis, and this was great for it. Love the Cheese.
-Durden‚Äù
‚ÄúVery nice med.  wicked smell but smokes decent and vaporizes VERY well.  Enough said....gotta go feed the walruses.‚Äù
‚ÄúGreat UK Indica, used this strain to make RS Oil for my father in-law who has stage 4 cancer. Very powerful.‚Äù
‚ÄúVery very VERY nice! .5 grams got me a nice body high and a gram in and I couldn't feel anything (in the best way!) need to lock it up though as the smell is very potent!‚Äù
‚Äúgreat for pain and helping relax smell musty and sweet berry aroma‚Äù
‚Äúbest strain EVER WOW it tastes so good and knocks you flat on your ass. great indica 10/10 all across the board.‚Äù
